DOC.brief_summary: The goal of the present study was to objectively evaluate the postural behaviour of type II obese patients as compared to adults showing a normal body mass index (BMI) in critical postural tasks.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Obesity on Postural Control
DOC.criteria: Inclusion: BMI > 35 or BMI < 25 Exclusion: Muscular, neurological or cardiovascular deficits Competitive physical activities
